title: Shut Down (Various Artists) flac
description:
Listen to SHUT DOWN...you can almost smell the rubber burn!
This is a romping, road searing album that's titled after the then current high-riding hit by The Beach Boys. The seven diffeent vocal groups, instrumentalists, and individual singing stars heard in the album offer selections which have become lasting hit renditions of songs about the fun, thrills and escitement of the road.

In addition to The Beach Boys, you'll hear The Cheers, The Super Stocks, The Eligibles, Jimmy Dolan. The Piltdown Men, and screen star Robert Mitchum, singing his famed "The Ballad of Thunder Road." - top tunes by top artists, each one trying to outgun the other at every turn.

The Beach Boys   - Shut Down
The Cheers       - Chicken
The Super Stocks - Wide Track
The PiltDown Men - Bronosaurus Stomp
The Super Stocks - Four On The Floor
The Cheers       - Black Denim Trousers And Motorcycle Boots
The Beach Boys   - 409
The Super Stocks - Street Machine
Robert Mitchum   - The Ballad of Thunder Road
Jimmy Dolan      - Hot Rod Race
The Eligibles    - Car Trouble
The Super Stocks - Cheater Slicks
